name: Web App — nailissa.fr
overview: Creating a website for Nailissa, a nail prosthetist from La Rochelle. Front-end using Angular 2+, reactive programming (RxJs), using NgRx to manage data. Back-end using Node.js for saving user and service information.

name: Mobile App — Vente de Pizza
overview: Creating a mobile application - technical test submitted to a colleague whom i also submitted to, out of curiosity.

name: Web App — Clone de Netflix
overview: Cloning the Netflix website in order to deepen my understanding of Angular 2+. A user account on a REST API created for this purpose, existing API requests for movie and TV show data.

name: Web App — Porte-Folio
overview: Creating the first version of my portfolio. I wanted to use React.js to deepen my knowledge of this framework.

name: Web App - Réseau Social
overview: Creating a social network 'From Scratch', both front-end and back-end. A diploma-granting OpenClassrooms project.

name: Web App - API Rest
overview: Creating a REST API using Node.js, using an existing front-end. An OpenClassrooms project.

name: Web App - finalgear.fr
overview: Creating a website for Final Gear, a French YouTuber who talks about Japanese video games. The front-end uses Angular 2+ and reactive programming with RxJs, and NgRx is used to manage data obtained from HTTP requests.
